and batman successfully brings lao back

superhero movies are required to explain
themselves when something seems too
far-fetched to believe that's kind of
the point of the word super but this
sequence definitely left more than a few
people saying yeah right nolan that
would never work and they'd be wrong
because this scene was directly based on
a real cia program called sky hook also
known as the fulton surface-to-air
recovery system the program was designed
to help rescue downed pilots or fleeing
spies who were stranded behind enemy
lines the downed pilot would deploy a
small balloon strap themselves in and
wait for a passing aircraft to grab the
line and pull them up and out of harm's
way we all stand corrected mr nolan
